titleInfo.title: Cowboy's Night at the Grand Ole Opry

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and brown on white) announcing a Cowboy's Night at the Grand Ole Opry on February 3. Poster features a woodcut of a cowgirl. Event features music by Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers, Carson Peters and Iron Mountains, Carly Pearce, Chris Janson, Josh Turner, and Trace Adkins.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
